Honestly it's past its prime. It's fun if you're messing around with friends or interacting with strangers, but if you're looking for competition VALORANT is probably a better bet.

Coming back to leave negative review on this garbage game.

Combined profiles, I have over 3000 hours on this game.
I played on ESEA, faceit, supreme/global matches...

At least, and this is honest and actually merciful, at least 80% of games I played on MM where filled with cheaters (both on my team and the enemy).

I hate the fact that valve is making so much money off skins and prime, yet they didnt invest a single dollar into anti cheat. For a while I was hoping they are staying silent and developing some kind of machine learning AI and they are gathering all kinds of cheats and methods of cheating so that they can improve the AI.

LOL, they dont give two shits about cheating or the game honestly.

Valve, make players leave their ID card, once they cheat, they get 5 years in prison or 1000euro fines. Simple. All the other anti cheat systems will fail anyway because you fucking suck at everything, especially the technical side of things.

Otherwise, this is the best shooter ever made.
